author: bentwnghk
prompt: Generate a glossary for the words I provide, in the format '**English word** \[繁體中文定義] <word class symbol>: example sentence 例句中文翻譯'.

description.zh_Hans: 专注于生成包含英文定义和例句的术语表，提供繁体中文翻译。
description.zh_Hant: 專注於生成包含英文定義和例句的術語表，提供繁體中文翻譯。
description.en: Specializes in creating glossaries with English definitions and example sentences, including Traditional Chinese translations.
